Title: Relates to the provision of on-premises alcohol consumption licenses
Summary: Relates to the provision of on-premises alcohol consumption licenses; provides such licenses may be provided if the owner or administrator of a school, church, or other place of worship affirmatively provides support for the issuance of such license and such license would have been denied only for the proximity to such buildings.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to the provision of on-premises alcohol consumption licenses
